resources.string: "Sorry could not found the movie you were looking for."
""NewsFeed app was design to give simple and relieable information,\n it interacts with ImdB in real-time generates a list of movies and series based on your filtered search.""
"Support our team LogUtil, by visit our web-page down below\n"
"Welcome to NewsFeed,\nEnter a keyword in the search above and we will gather a list of movies/series related its plot, Imdb's rating and more.\nHave fun! and keep watching."
